snippet: Jonathan Grayer, the chief of Weld North, has acquired two digital learning businesses that will help the company expand into school management and teaching English as a second language.
abstract: Jonathan Grayer, the chief of Weld North, has acquired two digital learning businesses that will help the company expand into school management and teaching English as a second language.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Ex-Chief of Kaplan Aims to Build a Rival Digital Learning Company
headline.print_headline: Ex-Chief of Kaplan Aims to Build a Rival
